thread.title: Justin Bieber names new album 'Purpose' with cryptic Insta pic
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber names new album 'Purpose' with cryptic Insta pic - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Justin Bieber names new album 'Purpose' with cryptic Insta pic
text:
*Washington. D.C. Oct.3 (ANI): Justin Bieber has finally revealed the name of his most awaited album 'Purpose' with a cryptic image posted on social media.*
Washington. D.C. Oct.3 (ANI): Justin Bieber has finally revealed the name of his most awaited album 'Purpose' with a cryptic image posted on social media. According to the Hollywood Reporter, the 21-year-old singer took to Instagram to announce the name of his new album and posted the cryptic pic with the title 'Purpose' and the hashtag #6weeks. Earlier, the 'Baby' hit-maker teased his fans by posting black and white snapshots all bearing the inscription, "Purpose #sixweeks." It is said that the title six weeks refers to the album's release date. (ANI) Â»
